For you, this means a wide variety of job roles, and exciting opportunities for learning and career development.
De ion
BASF has been a committed partner to Greater China since 1885. With large production sites in Shanghai, Nanjing and Chongqing, as well as a global and regional research and development hub in Shanghai, BASF is a major foreign investor in the country's chemical industry. BASF posted sales of approximately \u20ac8.5 billion in 2020 to customers in Greater China and employed 8,948 people as of the end of the year. For further information, please visit www.basf.com/cn/en.
Objectives:
  • Ensure safety and smooth running of electric equipment and facility in BCCS.
  • Ensure the firefighting system of BCCS under normal situation.
  • Arrange routine maintenance and TAR related with electric equipment using.
  • Coordinate with the technical support teams and the production teams for project execution of electric discipline as planning, application, design, procurement, construction management etc. based on BASF guidelines.
  • Provide engineering proposals and feasible study with the calculation of electric discipline and energy balance, drawings and technical datasheets for MOC or project
  • Quality identification and control for site electric discipline maintenance & TAR, construction and purchased electric equipment.

Main Tasks:
  • Arrange the routine work of electric team.
  • Guide and coach the contractors in technical skill and working method. Arrange training for workshop and contractors as required.
  • Establishing the preventive maintenance and daily maintenance plan related with electric management.
  • Project execution of electric discipline as planning, application, design, procurement, construction management etc. based on BASF guidelines.
  • Develop engineering proposals and feasible study for electric discipline and energy balance, drawings and technical datasheets of MOC or project
  • Monitor the safety stock of electric spare parts and issue purchasing request or suggestion. *Develop electric technical material code in SAP system according to BASF standard.
  • Deploy the available manpower to troubleshoot potential and existing electric problem in time and effectively. Make suggestions of team building and of keeping electric device running in a good state.
  • Develop KPI and quality identification to supervise the electric maintenance work, project construction and purchased electric equipment according to BASF standard. To increase productivity, implement improvement of working conditions to reduce risk.
  • Ensure the firefighting system of BCCS under normal situation.
  • Directly communicate with the user to improve efficiency. Cooperate with production operator closely to ensure electrical equipment running smoothly.
  • Support instrument supervisor and mechanical supervisor on their routine work.
  • Carry out functions assigned by supervisor and issue oral or written report to supervisor every week.

Requirements:
  • Education: Electric Engineering, and or Electromechanical integration, Diploma and above
  • Working Experience: 5~8 years electric discipline of operation, or maintenance and or engineering
  • Technical & Professional Knowledge:
    • Electrician Certificate of Low & High Voltage.
    • Collaborative hands on attitude,
    • Well organized, precise working attitude
